queryName: Response on operations that should not have a body has declared content (v3)
descriptionText: If a response is head or its code is 204 or 304, it shouldn't have a content defined

2.0.queryName: Response on operations that should not have a body has declared content (v2)
2.0.descriptionText: If a response is head or its code is 204 or 304, it shouldn't have a schema defined
